title: The contest was recounted in the epic cycle, both in the Aethiopis and in the Little Iliad. It was also the subject of a tragedy by Aeschylus and, much later in Rome, by Pacuvius and by Accius. See Hopkinson 2000, 10–16, for a convenient summary of the background, with scholarship
